price: «ጌታችን ሆይ! አንተ በርሱ (ለመምጣቱ) ጥርጥር የሌለበት በኾነ ቀን ሰውን ሁሉ ሰብሳቢ ነህ፡፡ ምንጊዜም አላህ ቀጠሮውን አያፈርስምና፡፡»
arabic: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ جَامِعُ ٱلنَّاسِ لِيَوۡمٖ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُخۡلِفُ ٱلۡمِيعَادَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā innaka jāmiʿu al-nāsi liyawmin lā rayba fīhi inna al-laha lā yukh'lifu al-mīʿāda
